alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Western Mogollon Rim; Yavapai County Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 30 at 10:02PM MST until January 01 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SATURDAY ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 6000 feet. Snow showers develop after midnight tonight and continue into Saturday morning, with the heaviest snow Friday evening into early Saturday. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Areas near Doney Park, Flagstaff, Grand Canyon, Jacob Lake, North Rim, Valle and Williams. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute, as well as any New Year`s Eve travel. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Snow forecast from 11 PM Today to 5 AM Saturday: Doney Park 2 to 4 inches Flagstaff 3 to 5 inches Grand Canyon 1 to 3 inches Jacob Lake 4 to 6 inches North Rim 4 to 6 inches Williams 3 to 5 inches Valle 1 to 3 inches .
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Western Mogollon Rim; Yavapai County Mountains
